headline: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights Visa, Advanced Micro Devices and Thermo Fisher Scientific
summary: Visa, AMD and Thermo Fisher Scientific headline Zacks' top analyst reports, spotlighting digital payments strength, AI-driven chip demand and life-sciences innovation.
